record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2125 AND H.R. 1650
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2125 AND H.R. 1650 -- (House of Representatives - July 17, 2008)

[Page: H6710]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed from two bills, H.R. 2125 and H.R. 1650.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from North Carolina?
